sources.title: Dealing With Dad | Drama Comedy Movie | Ally Maki | Karan Soni
sources.description:
Dealing With Dad | Drama Comedy Movie | Ally Maki | Karan Soni

Margaret Chang (Ally Maki) finds herself back in her quirky hometown, begrudgingly joined by her hapless brothers (Hayden Szeto, Peter S. Kim) to tackle the unexpected depression of their totally obnoxious dad (Dana Lee). Surprisingly, it turns out that Dad is actually more pleasant when he's down in the dumps than when he's his usual jerk self! As the siblings navigate the hilarity of their chaotic family dynamics, they begin to question whether they should even bother trying to lift his spirits in this super funny family comedy-drama.

2022.  Stars: Ally Maki, Hayden Szeto, Peter S. Kim

metadata.Plot: Margaret Chang (Ally Maki) reluctantly returns to her hometown along with her hapless brothers (Hayden Szeto, Peter S. Kim) to deal with the sudden depression of their complete-jerk father (Dana Lee). It turns out Dad is nicer depressed than well, and the siblings wonder if they should even get him better as they struggle to find a solution in this comedic drama.
metadata.Actors: Ally Maki, Hayden Szeto, Peter S. Kim
